content:
I think I'll start by gathering all the photos I've found and sorting them chronologically. That way, I can get a sense of the story I want to tell and the memories I want to highlight. I might also ask my mom and other family members if they have any photos or stories to contribute.

It's interesting that you mention digital scrapbooking. I've considered creating a digital version of the album, too. Do you have any recommendations for software or apps that can help me do that?
